doc:
Paul Opacic https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Opacic 0 Paul Opacic (born 1966 in Halifax, West Yorkshire) is an English actor. He is best known for his roles as Jules in Only fools and Horses and Carl Costello in Hollyoaks, Steve Marchant in Emmerdale and Mark Waddle in Bad Girls. Paul_Opacic ( born 1966 in Halifax , West_Yorkshire ) is an_English_actor . He is_best_known for his_roles as Jules in Only_fools_and_Horses and Carl_Costello in Hollyoaks , Steve_Marchant in Emmerdale and Mark_Waddle in Bad_Girls .
